mapper.select:
select
from ujcms_org t join ujcms_user_org userOrg on t.id_ = userOrg.org_id_ where userOrg.user_id_ = #{userId} order by userOrg.order_

select t.id_ from ujcms_org t
t.id_ in (select roleOrg.org_id_ from ujcms_role_org roleOrg where roleOrg.role_id_ in #{id})
or t.id_ in (select orgPerm.perm_org_id_ from ujcms_org_perm orgPerm where orgPerm.org_id_ in #{id})
select t.id_, t.parent_id_ from ujcms_org t order by t.order_, t.id_

select max(c.order_) from ujcms_org c
join ujcms_org_tree t on c.id_ = t.descendant_id_ where t.ancestor_id_ = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

sql.if: , CASE WHEN exists(select * from ujcms_org t_org_ where t_org_.parent_id_ = t.id_) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END as has_children_
join ujcms_org_tree orgTree on t.id_ = orgTree.descendant_id_

mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_org (id_, parent_id_, name_, phone_, address_, contacts_, depth_, order_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depth,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER})
